instruction: Please research and recommend energy-efficient lighting options for our office building to comply with sustainability goals.
output: Based on my research, implementing LED lighting could greatly reduce energy consumption in our office building while also providing long-lasting and cost-effective lighting solutions. I recommend reaching out to local suppliers and contractors to explore options and determine the most efficient and sustainable lighting plan for our building. Additionally, we may be eligible for incentives or rebates for making energy-efficient upgrades. Let me know if you would like me to draft a proposal to present to management.
